pageProduct.name: Swisse Vitamin C 1000mg 150 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Ultiboost High Strength C is a premium quality formula containing a non-acidic form of vitamin C (calcium ascorbate) to support a healthy immune system function, help reduce the duration and severity of common cold symptoms, maintain skin health and antioxidant activity.

Immune Function: The immune system is composed of cells and molecules organised into specialised tissues, which act as the body's first line of defence. Vitamin C supports a healthy immune system function and response. Vitamin C also maintains the immune system to fight illness.

Common Cold Symptoms: Vitamin C helps reduce the duration and severity of common cold symptoms.

Non-acidic Formula: Formulated with a non-acidic form of vitamin C (calcium ascorbate), making it gentle on the stomach.

Skin Health: Vitamin C maintains the health and formation of collagen to support skin health. Vitamin C also supports skin elasticity, firmness, repair and wound healing.

Antioxidant Support: Vitamin C provides antioxidants to help reduce free radicals formed in the body and supports general health and wellbeing.

Iron Absorption: Vitamin C supports the absorption of dietary iron.

Vitamin C is water-soluble, therefore is not stored in large amounts in the body. Swisse Ultiboost High Strength C has been formulated based on scientific evidence to provide high strength vitamin C in a convenient, one-a-day dose.

Size: 150 Pack

Warnings

If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare practitioner. Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet. Adults only.

Ingredients

EACH TABLET CONTAINS:

VITAMIN C (ascorbic acid from calcium ascorbate dihydrate 1.21 g) 1 g

Directions

ADULT DOSAGE:

One tablet daily with main meal, or as directed by a healthcare practitioner.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30 degrees Celsius. Do not use if cap seal is broken.
